<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_8481_delta.DeltaSPUtils</api_name><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>DeltaSPUtils</name><script><![CDATA[var DeltaSPUtils = Class.create();

DeltaSPUtils.loadData = function(){
	var summary = {
		portals: 0,
		widgets: 0,
		pages: 0
	};
	var portals = {};
	var portalCount = 0;
	var pages = {};
	var widgets = {};
	};


DeltaSPUtils.getPortalStats = function() {
	output = {
		'portals': 0,
		'widgets': 0,
		'pages' : 0
	};
	
	var grPortal = new GlideRecord('sp_portal');
	grPortal.query();
	output.portals = grPortal.getRowCount();
	
	var grWidget = new GlideRecord('sp_widget');
	grWidget.query();
	output.widgets = grWidget.getRowCount();
	
	var grPages = new GlideRecord('sp_page');
	grPages.query();
	output.pages = grPages.getRowCount();
	
	
	return output;
	
};

DeltaSPUtils.getPortals = function() {
	
	var records = [];
	var grPortalList = new GlideRecord('sp_portal');
	grPortalList.orderBy('title');
	grPortalList.query();
	
	while(grPortalList.next()){
		var record = {
			"sysID" : grPortalList.getValue('sys_id'),
			"title" :  grPortalList.title.getDisplayValue(),
			"scope" : grPortalList.sys_scope.getDisplayValue(),
			"url_suffix" : grPortalList.url_suffix.getDisplayValue(),
			"homepage" : grPortalList.homepage.getDisplayValue(),
			"kb_knowledge_page" : grPortalList.kb_knowledge_page.getDisplayValue(),
			"theme" : grPortalList.theme.getDisplayValue(),
			"search_sources" : DeltaSPUtils.getSearchSources(grPortalList.sys_id),
			"knowledge_bases" : DeltaSPUtils.getKnowledgeBases(grPortalList.sys_id),
			"catalogs" : DeltaSPUtils.getCatalogs(grPortalList.sys_id),
			"expanded" : false
		};
		records.push(record);
	}
	
	return records;
	
};

DeltaSPUtils.getSearchSources = function(portal) {
	var records = [];
	var grSearchSource = new GlideRecord('m2m_sp_portal_search_source');
	grSearchSource.addQuery('sp_portal',portal);
	grSearchSource.query();
	while(grSearchSource.next()){
		var record = {
			"source" :  grSearchSource.sp_search_source.getDisplayValue(),
			"sp_portal" : grSearchSource.sp_portal.getDisplayValue()
		};
		records.push(record);
	}
	return records;
};

DeltaSPUtils.getKnowledgeBases = function(portal) {
	var records = [];
	var grKB = new GlideRecord('m2m_sp_portal_knowledge_base');
	grKB.addQuery('sp_portal',portal);
	grKB.query();
	while(grKB.next()){
		var record = {
			"knowledgebase" :  grKB.kb_knowledge_base.getDisplayValue(),
			"sp_portal" : grKB.sp_portal.getDisplayValue(),
			"active" : grKB.active.getDisplayValue(),
			"order" : grKB.order.getDisplayValue()
		};
		records.push(record);
	}
	return records;
};

DeltaSPUtils.getCatalogs = function(portal) {
	var records = [];
	var grCatalogs = new GlideRecord('m2m_sp_portal_catalog');
	grCatalogs.addQuery('sp_portal',portal);
	grCatalogs.query();
	while(grCatalogs.next()){
		var record = {
			"catalog" :  grCatalogs.sc_catalog.getDisplayValue(),
			"sp_portal" : grCatalogs.sp_portal.getDisplayValue(),
			"active" : grCatalogs.active.getDisplayValue(),
			"order" : grCatalogs.order.getDisplayValue()
		};
		records.push(record);
	}
	return records;
};

/*****************************************************
 ****************************************************/
DeltaSPUtils.getPages = function() {
	var baseURL = '$spd.do#/sp/editor/';
	var records = [];
	var grPages = new GlideRecord('sp_page');
	grPages.orderBy('title');
	grPages.query();
	
	while(grPages.next()){
		var record = {
			"title" :  grPages.title.getDisplayValue(),
			"id" : grPages.getValue('id'),
			"public" : grPages.getDisplayValue('public') ,
			"draft" : grPages.getDisplayValue('draft'),
			"editLink" : baseURL + grPages.getValue('id') + '/'
		};
		records.push(record);
	}
	
	return records;
	
};

/*****************************************************
 ****************************************************/
DeltaSPUtils.getWidgets = function() {
	var baseURL = gs.getProperty('glide.servlet.uri') + 'sp_config?id=widget_editor&sys_id=';
	
	var records = [];
	var grWidgets = new GlideRecord('sp_widget');
	grWidgets.orderBy('name');
	grWidgets.query();
	
	while(grWidgets.next()){
		var record = {
			"name" :  grWidgets.getDisplayValue('name'),
			"id" : grWidgets.getValue('id'),
			"public" : grWidgets.getDisplayValue('public'),
			"editLink" : baseURL + grWidgets.sys_id
		};
		records.push(record);
	}
	
	return records;
	
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>brichards99</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-02-12 21:05:10</sys_created_on><sys_id>92f598f7db320010bdf72bfa4b96192a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>DeltaSPUtils</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Delta" source="x_8481_delta">89c51077db320010bdf72bfa4b961992</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Delta">89c51077db320010bdf72bfa4b961992</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_92f598f7db320010bdf72bfa4b96192a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>brichards99</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-02-13 15:33:26</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
